thread.title: Cancer is rising six times faster in women than men
thread.title_full: Cancer is rising six times faster in women than men

title: Cancer is rising six times faster in women than men
text: Cancer is rising six times faster in women than men due to bad lifestyle choices - as more smoke and drink than ever before Obesity, smoking and drinking have been highlighted as causes for the increase Factors could send cases of breast, ovarian, liver and lung cancer soaring Cancer Research UK estimates that incidences of the disease will rise 3.2 per cent for women until 2035, compared to just 0.5 per cent for men One reason is that many more women smoke and drink than before
